duties_responsibilities.duty: Support operational management between property projects and vendors.
Onboard internal and external vendors and complete all data updates to existing vendors.
Audit vendor application submissions containing a variety of legal documents.
Confirm vendor compliance required for insurance, licensing, and other documentation.

education_certification.credential: 2+ years of working experience in administration; construction, vendor management or similar industry.
Strong computer proficiency including Microsoft Excel, Word, and Outlook is a MUST
Knowledge of Facility Maintenance, Yardi, or CRM Dynamics preferred
Ability to interact effectively, have strong written and verbal communication skills, and be internet savvy.
